Question
========

The model comparison test compares two linear regression models. Which statement about this test is correct? 
Answerlist
----------
* It is an F test. The models must be nested.
* It is an F key. The models do not have to be nested.
* It is a t-test. The models must be nested.
* It is a t-test. The models need not be nested.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
